snippet.title: The Coin Game Official trailer
snippet.description:
The Coin Game is a fun ticket redemption arcade game with realistic physics, a carnival, goofy robots, open world design, a global ranking system and lots of silly prizes. The game includes 40+ modern inspired arcade machines and a pawn shop to keep money in your pocket. The Coin Game is made by a solo developer. Available on Steam Early Access for PC. 

Get the full game here... https://store.steampowered.com/app/598980/The_Coin_Game/
Visit us on Indie DB @  https://www.indiedb.com/games/the-coin-game

Song: "Gridrunner" Artist: Kevin Flynn @ https://soundcloud.com/kevinflynnretro
